slides.title: Definition
slides.description:
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is an area of computer science that emphasizes the creation of intelligent machines that work and react like humans. Some of the activities computers with AI are designed for include:
- Speech recognition
- Learning
- Planning
- Problem solving

slides.title: Examples of AI technology
slides.description: Examples of AI technology include virtual assistants, chatbots, facial recognition, autonomous vehicles, and more.

slides.title: Narrow/Weak AI
slides.description: AIs that are trained to perform specific tasks, like image recognition or voice commands.

slides.title: General/Strong AI
slides.description: AIs that are capable of performing any intellectual task that a human can.

slides.title: Examples of narrow/weak AI
slides.description: Examples of narrow/weak AI include Siri, Amazon Alexa, and social media image recognition.

slides.title: Healthcare
slides.description: AI is being used in healthcare to help diagnose and treat diseases.

slides.title: Finance
slides.description: AI is being used in finance to detect fraud and manage investments.

slides.title: Marketing
slides.description: AI is being used in marketing to analyze customer behavior and provide personalized experiences.

slides.title: AI in healthcare example
slides.description: AI is being used in healthcare to develop new drugs and treatments.
